00034 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer() {
00035     _attach_0();
00036 }
00037 
00049 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const nothrow_integer& b) {
00050     try {
00051         if (!b.is_nan()) _attach(b);
00052     } catch (std::exception&) {
00053         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00054     }
00055 }

00068     try {
00069         _attach(b);
00070     } catch (std::exception&) {
00071         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00072     }
00073 }

00090 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00091     try {
00092         _attach(from_string(str, base));
00093     } catch (std::exception&) {
00094         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00095     }
00096 }

00102 bool nothrow_integer::odd() const {
00103     if (is_nan()) return false;
00104     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00105 }
00106 
00111 bool nothrow_integer::even() const {
00112     if (is_nan()) return false;
00113     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00114 }
00115 
00120 int nothrow_integer::sign(bool signed_zero) const {
00121     if (is_nan()) return 0;
00122     if (!signed_zero && _is_zero()) return 0;
00123     else return (_get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00124 }
00125 
00130 size_t nothrow_integer::hex_digits() const {
00131     try {
00132         size_t bits=_log2();
00133         return (bits+3)/4; // Four bits per hex digit, rounded up
00134     } catch (std::exception&) {
00135         return 0;
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00145 bool nothrow_integer::is_nan() const {
00146     return _is_nan();
00147 }

00149 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator+=(const nothrow_integer& addend) {
00150     try {
00151         detail::add(*this, *this, addend);
00152     } catch (std::exception&) {
00153         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00154     }
00155     return *this;

00160         detail::subtract(*this, *this, subtrahend);
00161     } catch (std::exception&) {
00162         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00163     }
00164     return *this;

00167 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(
00168     nothrow_integer) c)
00169 {
00170     try {
00171         _attach(c);
00172     } catch (std::exception&) {
00173         _base_attach(0);
00174     }
00175     return *this;
00176 }

00178 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator-() const { return negate(*this); }

00180 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator*=(const nothrow_integer& b) { detail::multiply(*this, *this, b); return *this; }

00182 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator%=(const nothrow_integer& b) { detail::mod(*this, *this, b); return *this; }

00184 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator++() { _make_unique(true); _increment(); return *this; }
00185 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator--() { _make_unique(true); _decrement(); return *this; }
00186 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator++(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; _make_unique(true); _increment(); return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(s); }
00187 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator--(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; _make_unique(true); _decrement(); return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(s); }

00189 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator<<(size_t shift) const { return shift_left(*this, shift); }
00190 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator>>(size_t shift) const { return shift_right(*this, shift); }
00191 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator&=(const nothrow_integer& n) { detail::bitwise_and(*this, *this, n); return *this; }
00192 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator|=(const nothrow_integer& n) { detail::bitwise_or(*this, *this, n); return *this; }
00193 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator^=(const nothrow_integer& n) { detail::bitwise_xor(*this, *this, n); return *this; }

00195 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator<<=(size_t shift) {
00196     try {
00197         detail::shift_left(*this, *this, shift);
00198     } catch (std::exception&) {
00199         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00200     }
00201     return *this;
00202 }

00204 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator>>=(size_t shift) {
00205     try {
00206         detail::shift_right(*this, *this, shift);
00207     } catch (std::exception&) {
00208         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00209     }
00210     return *this;
00211 }

00213 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::zero() {
00214     if (cZero.get()==0) {
00215         cZero.reset(new nothrow_integer(integer::zero()));
00216         cZero->_set_readonly();
00217     }
00218     return *cZero;
00219 }
00220 
00221 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::one() {
00222     if (cOne.get()==0) {
00223         cOne.reset(new nothrow_integer(integer::one()));
00224         cOne->_set_readonly();
00225     }
00226     return *cOne;
00227 }
00228 
00229 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::nan() {
00230     if (cNaN.get()==0) {
00231         cNaN.reset(new nothrow_integer());
00232         cNaN->_base_attach(0);
00233         cNaN->_set_readonly();
00234     }
00235     return *cNaN;
00236 }
00237 
00238 void nothrow_integer::_make_unique(bool) {
00239     try {
00240         detail::base_integer::_make_unique();
00241     } catch (std::exception&) {
00242         _base_attach(0); // Turns it into a Not-a-Number.
00243     }
00244 }
